title: Classic Interview (Diddy and  Miss Pat)
itunes:title: Classic Interview (Diddy and  Miss Pat)
description:
Happy New Year! For our Best of show we flashed back to our interview with Diddy as well as flashed back to our first time interview with Ms Pat. Also, we flashed back to the time Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a reporter that quits on live on air after winning the lottery, but then later finds out it was only for $5,

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
